thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Mondelez quarterly revenue rises 3 percent

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Mondelez quarterly revenue rises 3 percent
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Mondelez International Inc, the worldâ€™s second-largest confectionary company, on Wednesday reported a 3 percent rise in quarterly revenue, fueled by strong demand for its key brands like Cadbury Dairy Milk and Oreo cookies.
Net income attributable to the company rose to $802 million, or 53 cents per share in the fourth quarter ended Dec. 31, from $93 million, or 6 cents per share, a year earlier.
U.S. tax reform resulted in a net tax benefit of $59 million.
The East Hanover, New Jersey- based company said its net revenue rose to $6.97 billion.
Reporting by Vibhuti Sarma; Editing by Bernard Orr
